1.1.0: Fixed Lightorio Incompability, added update checker
1.1.2: Fixed problem with save files with spaces in the names
1.2.0: Fixed problem with mod names with symbols, added changelog
2.0.0: Added HD mode. Also allow more zoom levels in general.
2.1.0: Block all 404 requests, The client now knows exactly which images exist. (Breaks old maps)
2.2.0: Significantly increased image quality and file size at the cost of some processing time.
2.4.0: Fixed a bug in the image deduplicator.
2.4.1: Added a simple gui with instructions.
3.0.0: Tags can now be seen on the map!
3.0.1: Added flags to set maximum threads used.
